1.verse: UPawulos, umkhonzi kathixo, umpostile ke kaYesu Kristu,  ngokokholo lwabanyulwa bakaThixo, nokuyazi inyaniso engokokuhlonela uThixo;

2.verse: ngethemba lobomi obungunaphakade, awathi uThixo,  ongenakuxoka, wabubeka idinga ngaphambi kwamaxesha angunaphakade,

3.verse: walibonakalisa ke ilizwi lakhe ngamaxesha angawalo,  ngokuvakalisa endakuphathiswayo mna, ngokommiselo woMsindisi wethu uThixo:

4.verse: kuTito, umntwana wam wenene ngokwaselukholweni,  esinobudlelane ngalo: Makube lubabalo, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uYise, nakuYesu Kristu, uMsindisi wethu.

5.verse: Ndakushiya eKrete ngenxa yoku, ukuze uhambise ukuzilungisa izinto eziseleyo, umise amadoda amakhulu kwimizi ngemizi,  njengoko ndakumisela ngako mna:

6.verse: ukuba umntu ungongenakumangaleleka, eyindoda yamfazi mnye enabantwana abakholiweyo, abangamiselwa tyala lakuzibhubhisa,  abangaswele kuthobela mntu.

7.verse: Kuba umveleli umelwe kukuba ngongenakumangaleleka,  njengegosa likaThixo; angabi ngowenza ukuzithandela kwakhe;  angabi ngoqumba msinya; angabi ngogeziswa yiwayini; angabi ngumbethi; angabi ngongxamela nzuzo imbi.

8.verse: Umelwe kukuthi abe ngobuka iindwendwe, umthandi wokulungileyo, onesidima, olilungisa, ongcwele, onokuzeyisa;

9.verse: ebambelele ezwini elithembekileyo ngokwemfundiso, ukuze abe nako ukuvuselela ngayo imfundiso ephilileyo, nokubohlwaya badane abaphikayo.

10.verse: Kuba baninzi abathethi bezinto ezingento nabakhohlisi,  abaswele intobeko, ngokukodwa abo bolwaluko,

11.verse: abamelwe kukuvingcwa imilomo; abathi izindlu ziphela bazibhukuqe, befundisa izinto ezingafanelekileyo ngenxa yenzuzo embi.

12.verse: Wathi omnye wabo, kwaumprofeti wakowabo, AmaKrete ahlala engamaxoki, amarhamncwa amabi, amadla-kudla angasebenziyo.

13.verse: Obo bungqina buyinene. Ngenxa yeli thuba bohlwaye kabukhali, badane, ukuze baphile elukholweni;

14.verse: banganyamekeli zintsomi zabuYuda, namithetho yabantu abayinikela umva inyaniso.

15.verse: Izinto zonke zihlambulukile kwabahlambulukileyo;  kwabadyobhekileyo nabangakholwayo, akukho nto ihlambulukileyo;  kusuke kwadyobheka nengqiqo nesazela sabo.

16.verse: Bayavuma ukuba bayamazi uThixo; kanti ngayo imisebenzi bayamkhanyela, bengamasikizi, bengabangevayo, nakumsebenzi wonke olungileyo bengenakucikideka.

1.verse: Ke wena, thetha izinto eziyifaneleyo imfundiso ephilileyo;

2.verse: ukuba amadoda amakhulu abe ziingcathu, andileke, abe nesidima, aphile elukholweni, eluthandweni, elunyamezelweni;

3.verse: ukuba abafazi abakhulu kwangokunjalo babe nesimilo esibafaneleyo, bangabi ngabatyholi; bangazilahleli kwiwayini eninzi; bafundise okuhle;

4.verse: ukuze bayale abafazana ukuba babe nesidima, bawathande amadoda abo, babathande abantwana babo,

5.verse: babe nesidima, babe nyulu, basebenze ezindlwini zabo, babe nokulunga, bawathobele awabo amadoda, ukuze ilizwi likaThixo linganyeliswa.

6.verse: Kwangokunjalo amadoda amatsha wayale ukuba abe nesidima.

7.verse: Ezintweni zonke zenze umzekelo wemisebenzi emihle;

8.verse: emfundisweni ube ngomsulwa, ngondilekileyo, ngolizwi liphilileyo, lingenakugwetywa; ukuze ochasayo abe neentloni,  engenanto imbi yakuthetha ngani.

9.verse: Amakhoboka wathethele ukuba azithobele iinkosi zawo, abe ngakholekileyo kakuhle ezintweni zonke, engaphiki; angashinti;

10.verse: asuke abonakalalise konke ukuthembeka okulungileyo, ukuze ayivathise imfundiso yoMsindisi wethu uThixo ezintweni zonke.

11.verse: Kuba lubonakele kubantu bonke ubabalo lukaThixo,  lulolusindisayo;

12.verse: lusiqeqesha ukuze sithi, sikuncama ukungahloneli Thixo nokukhanuka okukokwehlabathi, sihlale ngokunesidima,  nangokubulungisa, nangokuhlonela uThixo, kweli phakade langoku;

13.verse: silinde ithemba elinoyolo, nembonakalo yobuqaqawuli boThixo omkhulu, uMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu,

14.verse: owazinikela ngenxa yethu, ukuze asikhulule ngokusihlawulela kuko konke ukuchasa umthetho, azihlambululele abantu abangabakhe, abazondelela imisebenzi emihle.

15.verse: Ezi zinto zithethe, uvuselele, wohlwaye ngawo wonke ummiselo. Makungabikho namnye ukudelayo.

1.verse: Bakhumbuze ukuba bathobele oozilawuli noomagunya,  baphulaphule abaphathi, bawulungele wonke umsebenzi olungileyo.

2.verse: Mabanganyelisi namnye umntu, bangabi nakulwa, babe nokuthantamisa, bebonakala benobulali bonke kubantu bonke.

3.verse: Kuba nathi sibe sifudula singabasweli-kuqonda, singeva,  silahleka, sikhonza iinkanuko neziyolo ngeziyolo, sihleli ngolunya nomona, sinezothe, sithiyana.

4.verse: Kodwa kuthe kwakubonakala ububele bukaThixo, uMsindisi wethu, nokuthanda kwakhe abantu,

5.verse: kungengamisebenzi esebulungiseni esayenzayo thina,  kungokwenceba yakhe, wasisindisa ngentlambululo yokuzalwa ngokutsha, nangokuhlaziya koMoya oyiNgcwele;

6.verse: awamthululayo phezu kwethu ngokobutyebi, ngoYesu Kristu uMsindisi wethu;

7.verse: ukuze sithi, sigwetyelwe ngobabalo lwalowo, sibe ziindlalifa zobomi obungunaphakade ngokwethemba.

8.verse: Lithembekile ilizwi elo; nezo zinto ndinga ungaziqinisela,  ukuze banyameke, benze imisebenzi emihle, abo bakholiweyo kuThixo. Ezo zinto zintle, zinokubanceda abantu.

9.verse: Ke yona imibuzo yobudenge, nemilibo yokuzalwa, neenkani,  nokulwa ngawo umthetho, zinxweme, kuba azincedi lutho, asinto zanto.

10.verse: Umntu ongumahlukanisi, akuba elulekwe kanye nokuba kukabini, mmangale;

11.verse: usazi ukuba onjalo ugwenxeke kwaphela; uyona, ezigwebile ngokwakhe.

12.verse: Xenikweni ndithe ndathuma kuwe uArtemas, nokuba nguTikiko,  khawuleza uze kum eNikopolis; kuba ndigqibe kwelokuba ndobudlulisa ubusika khona apho.

13.verse: UZenas, umqondisi-mthetho, noApolos, baxhobisele indlela ngokunyameka, ukuze bangasweli nto.

14.verse: Abethu mabafunde ke ukwenza imisebenzi emihle yokunceda abaswele kanzima, ukuze bangabi ngabangenasiqhamo.

15.verse: Bayakubulisa bonke abanam. Babulise abo basithandayo ngokwaselukholweni. Ubabalo malube nani nonke. Amen.
